::Bloodystrike/Reptilica::

Bloodystrike nods, looking at Reptilica threateningly as the other 
one opens his mouth to make a comment.

"That would be excellent, my lady," he says, approaching the 
situation from another angle, a chivolrous one, "My friend here might 
not have any manners, but I respect the wishes of a female well."

Reptilica growls, losing his temper. "I have manners, you little..."

If Desmonus wasn't in the way, the two bots would have been at each 
other's throats. But then again, if Desmonus wasn't there, they 
wouldn't have a desire to kill each other.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> * Desmonus simply followed the lead of the two males, finally happy 
that 
> they had stopped bickering.
> She had been getting rather tired of it. But she was sure a nice 
drink and a 
> little talk would calm them down easily.
> 
> Turning her head towards Bloodystrike as he spoke she didn't fail 
to see and 
> hear the growl he aimed towards Reptilica when she heard him 
mention a drink 
> that she might like. But she nodded towards that.*
> 
> " Sounds like it would be worth while."
> 
> * Which was her answer to Reptilica.
> 
> * Desmonus smiled as Bloodystrike agreed to get aquainted with her, 
feeling 
> him pull her a little towards him, remembering that these two were 
most 
> likely the bots which had brought her in.
> But she remembered nothing before that of whom she might have been 
or what 
> side she had belonged to.
> The next pull being towards Reptilica.
> Always fighting weren't they?
> But she shook her head at Reptilicas words.*
> 
> " I'm sure both of you are very interesting...indeed."
> 
> * All three continued to where ever the two males were leading her, 
which 
> was fine with her as long as it wasn't towards their quarters.
> She wasn't in the mood for one.*
> 
> " And I plan to have a drink with both if you..."
